name: In re REGLAN/METOCLOPRAMIDE LITIGATION. Petition of First Databank, Inc.

parties: In re REGLAN/METOCLOPRAMIDE LITIGATION. Petition of First Databank, Inc.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of May, 2012, the Application to File under Seal and the Application for Leave to File a Reply are GRANTED, and the “Emergency Application for Extraordinary Relief under Pa.R.A.P. 3309 or Exercise of King’s Bench Powers” and the Application for Stay are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
45 A.3d 403
In re REGLAN/METOCLOPRAMIDE LITIGATION. Petition of First Databank, Inc.
No. 37 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 31, 2012.
